DataElement.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 Pathologic Tumor T Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the primary ovarian and peritoneal carcinoma based on evidence obtained from pathologic examination through completion of definitive surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to pathologic T stage of an ovarian tumor.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the ovaries, the female reproductive glands in which the ova (eggs) are formed. The ovaries are located in the pelvis, one on each side of the uterus.:(NEE-o-PLAY-zha) Abnormal and uncontrolled cell growth.

Concepts.longName: Ovarian
Concepts.definition: Having to do with the ovaries, the female reproductive glands in which the ova (eggs) are formed. The ovaries are located in the pelvis, one on each side of the uterus.

Concepts.longName: Neoplasm
Concepts.definition: A benign or malignant tissue growth resulting from uncontrolled cell proliferation. Benign neoplastic cells resemble normal cells without exhibiting significant cytologic atypia, while malignant cells exhibit overt signs such as dysplastic features, atypical mitotic figures, necrosis, nuclear pleomorphism, and anaplasia. Representative examples of benign neoplasms include papillomas, cystadenomas, and lipomas; malignant neoplasms include carcinomas, sarcomas, lymphomas, and leukemias.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pathologic; caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.:One criteria of the TMN staging system.  T refers to the extent of tumor involvement at the primary site (T, followed by a number indicating size and depth of invasion).

Concepts.longName: Pathologic
Concepts.definition: Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.

Concepts.longName: T Category
Concepts.definition: One criteria of the TNM staging system. T refers to the extent of tumor involvement at the primary site (T, followed by a number indicating size and depth of invasion).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: AJCC:American Joint Committee on Cancer Cancer Staging Manual, 6th Ed., 2002

ValueDomain.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Cancer American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 T Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A finding about one or more characteristics of ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system.  Ovarian cancer and primary peritoneal carcinoma are surgically/pathologically staged malignancies. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)_A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._One criteria of the TMN staging system.  T refers to the extent of tumor involvement at the primary site (T, followed by a number indicating size and depth of invasion)._The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma involving one or both ovaries with microscopically confirmed peritoneal metastasis outside the pelvis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma involving one or both ovaries with microscopically confirmed peritoneal metastasis outside the pelvis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer limited to ovaries (one or both). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer limited to ovaries (one or both). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1a TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1a TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer limited to one ovary; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface.  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1a TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer limited to one ovary; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface.  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1b TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1b TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer limited to both ovaries; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface.  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1b TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer limited to both ovaries; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface.  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1c TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1c TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma limited to one or both ovaries with any of the following: capsule ruptured, tumor on ovarian surface, malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT1c TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma limited to one or both ovaries with any of the following: capsule ruptured, tumor on ovarian surface, malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma involving one or both ovaries with pelvic extension. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma involving one or both ovaries with pelvic extension. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2a TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2a TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with extension and/or implants on uterus and/or tube(s).  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2a TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with extension and/or implants on uterus and/or tube(s).  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2b TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2b TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with extension to and/or implants on other pelvic tissues.  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2b TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with extension to and/or implants on other pelvic tissues.  No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2c TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2c TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with pelvic extension and/or implants (T2a or T2b) with malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT2c TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with pelvic extension and/or implants (T2a or T2b) with malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3a TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3a TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with microscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis (no macroscopic tumor). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3a TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with microscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis (no macroscopic tumor). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3b TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3b TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with macroscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis 2 cm or less in greatest dimension. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3b TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with macroscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis 2 cm or less in greatest dimension. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3c TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3c TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis more than 2 cm in greatest dimension and/or regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT3c TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis more than 2 cm in greatest dimension and/or regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pTX TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pTX TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma in which the primary tumor cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pTX TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma in which the primary tumor cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT0 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT0 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with no evidence of primary tumor. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Ovarian Cancer and Primary Peritoneal Carcinoma pT0 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Ovarian cancer or primary peritoneal carcinoma with no evidence of primary tumor. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: T Category
